title: Worksheet
description: A JSON representation of an Excel or Google Sheets worksheet containing rows and columns.

type.description: The response type, depending on the presence of the `sheet` request parameter.

limit.description: The maximum number of items requested by the `limit` parameter.

offset.description: The starting row that items have been retrieved by as specified by the `offset` parameter.

total.description: The total number of items in the data sheet. This value can be greater than the sum of `limit` and `offset`

data.description: The data rows that are part of the result set
